value:
$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Wait! We have no wish to fight you.
$k$pIn fact, I want to thank you for telling
us about Princess Veronica's plan
to destroy the ruins.$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|You want to thank me? Hah. You
don't understand a thing, do you?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|What?$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I'm just trying to keep things
interesting.$k$pIf my sister conquered Askr, she'd
steal all the glory. Who wants that?$k$p
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Your...sister?$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|That's right. Veronica is my little
sister.$k$pMy name is Bruno. Speaking
formally, you'd call me Prince Bruno
of the Emblian Empire.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Prince...Bruno? But...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|That's right. Your rival. That gives us
reason to fight to the death. And so
we will.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Go on. Keep fighting. No matter how
hard you try, your resistance is
meaningless.$k$pAs long as our Heroes hold that
ward, you stand no chance of
winning.$k$p
